39#ifndef __SHA2_H__
40#define __SHA2_H__
41
42#include <sys/types.h>
43
44/*** SHA-224/256/384/512 Various Length Definitions ***********************/
45#define SHA224_BLOCK_LENGTH 64
46#define SHA224_DIGEST_LENGTH 28
47#define SHA224_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH (SHA224_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1)
48#define SHA256_BLOCK_LENGTH 64
49#define SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH 32
50#define SHA256_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH (SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1)
51#define SHA384_BLOCK_LENGTH 128
52#define SHA384_DIGEST_LENGTH 48
53#define SHA384_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH (SHA384_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1)
54#define SHA512_BLOCK_LENGTH 128
55#define SHA512_DIGEST_LENGTH 64
56#define SHA512_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH (SHA512_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1)
57
58#ifndef __BEGIN_DECLS
59# if defined(__cplusplus)
60# define __BEGIN_DECLS extern "C" {
61# define __END_DECLS }
62# else
63# define __BEGIN_DECLS
64# define __END_DECLS
65# endif
66#endif
67
68/*** SHA-256/384/512 Context Structures *******************************/
69typedef struct _NETPGPV_SHA256_CTX {
70 uint32_t state[8];
71 uint64_t bitcount;
72 uint8_t buffer[SHA256_BLOCK_LENGTH];
73} NETPGPV_SHA256_CTX;
74
75typedef struct _NETPGPV_SHA512_CTX {
76 uint64_t state[8];
77 uint64_t bitcount[2];
78 uint8_t buffer[SHA512_BLOCK_LENGTH];
79} NETPGPV_SHA512_CTX;
80
81typedef NETPGPV_SHA256_CTX NETPGPV_SHA224_CTX;
82typedef NETPGPV_SHA512_CTX NETPGPV_SHA384_CTX;
83
84
85/*** SHA-256/384/512 Function Prototypes ******************************/
86__BEGIN_DECLS
87int netpgpv_SHA224_Init(NETPGPV_SHA224_CTX *);
88int netpgpv_SHA224_Update(NETPGPV_SHA224_CTX*, const uint8_t*, size_t);
89int netpgpv_SHA224_Final(uint8_t[SHA224_DIGEST_LENGTH], NETPGPV_SHA224_CTX*);
90#ifndef _KERNEL
91char *netpgpv_SHA224_End(NETPGPV_SHA224_CTX *, char[SHA224_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
92char *netpgpv_SHA224_FileChunk(const char *, char *, off_t, off_t);
93char *netpgpv_SHA224_File(const char *, char *);
94char *netpgpv_SHA224_Data(const uint8_t *, size_t, char[SHA224_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
95#endif /* !_KERNEL */
96
97int netpgpv_SHA256_Init(NETPGPV_SHA256_CTX *);
98int netpgpv_SHA256_Update(NETPGPV_SHA256_CTX*, const uint8_t*, size_t);
99int netpgpv_SHA256_Final(uint8_t[SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH], NETPGPV_SHA256_CTX*);
100#ifndef _KERNEL
101char *netpgpv_SHA256_End(NETPGPV_SHA256_CTX *, char[SHA256_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
102char *netpgpv_SHA256_FileChunk(const char *, char *, off_t, off_t);
103char *netpgpv_SHA256_File(const char *, char *);
104char *netpgpv_SHA256_Data(const uint8_t *, size_t, char[SHA256_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
105#endif /* !_KERNEL */
106
107int netpgpv_SHA384_Init(NETPGPV_SHA384_CTX*);
108int netpgpv_SHA384_Update(NETPGPV_SHA384_CTX*, const uint8_t*, size_t);
109int netpgpv_SHA384_Final(uint8_t[SHA384_DIGEST_LENGTH], NETPGPV_SHA384_CTX*);
110#ifndef _KERNEL
111char *netpgpv_SHA384_End(NETPGPV_SHA384_CTX *, char[SHA384_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
112char *netpgpv_SHA384_FileChunk(const char *, char *, off_t, off_t);
113char *netpgpv_SHA384_File(const char *, char *);
114char *netpgpv_SHA384_Data(const uint8_t *, size_t, char[SHA384_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
115#endif /* !_KERNEL */
116
117int netpgpv_SHA512_Init(NETPGPV_SHA512_CTX*);
118int netpgpv_SHA512_Update(NETPGPV_SHA512_CTX*, const uint8_t*, size_t);
119int netpgpv_SHA512_Final(uint8_t[SHA512_DIGEST_LENGTH], NETPGPV_SHA512_CTX*);
120#ifndef _KERNEL
121char *netpgpv_SHA512_End(NETPGPV_SHA512_CTX *, char[SHA512_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
122char *netpgpv_SHA512_FileChunk(const char *, char *, off_t, off_t);
123char *netpgpv_SHA512_File(const char *, char *);
124char *netpgpv_SHA512_Data(const uint8_t *, size_t, char[SHA512_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
125#endif /* !_KERNEL */
126__END_DECLS
127
128#endif /* __SHA2_H__ */
129
